The dynamics of the fraction of susceptible (S), infectious (I) and recovered (R) individuals are _S _I _R ¼ ¼ ¼ β SI αR 1 � þ β SI γI αR � 1 þ γI such that when α =0 we recover the conventional SIR model given transmission rate β and recovery rate γ.
